comments.body: Did you make sure that this one generates a sane string at the end?  YAML quotes and backslashes have a lot of little wrinkles.  (Single quotes are usually the right way to do it but there are some differences between single quotes and bare strings.  I don't know if any will be hit here).

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +77,81 @@    elements:
    - '%SystemRoot%\system32'
    - '%SystemRoot%\system32\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0'

- name: Ensure that C:\Program Files\MyJavaThing is not on the current user's CLASSPATH
